lead_paragraph: A black man who was killed by a white officer in Raleigh. N.C., on Monday was shot during a struggle when the man pulled a gun and then reached toward the officer’s weapon, the police said Thursday.

headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Details Released on Fatal Shooting by Police Officer
headline.main: North Carolina: Details Released on Fatal Shooting by Police Officer

snippet: A black man who was killed by a white officer in Raleigh. N.C., on Monday was shot during a struggle when the man pulled a gun and then reached toward the officer’s weapon, the police said Thursday.
abstract: Raleigh, NC, police say Akiel Denkins, black man shot dead by Police Officer D C Twiddy, who is white, had reached for Twiddy's weapon, and struggle ensued.
